subject: U-shaped mounting bracket
description_text:
Good morning, what is the optional U-shaped mounting bracket for the
throttle and brake used for? Does it allow the pedals to be positioned so
that the Linear Motor strikes the pedal/foot directly left–right instead of
striking up–down?

If the U-shaped mounting bracket is not intended for this purpose, what is
the recommended solution to mount the linear motors so that they can strike
the pedal/foot from the side (left–right)?

conversations.body_text:
Thank you for the answer.
